name: There Are Limits
description:
You are trapped, but you don't know why. All your senses are not responding.

But still, the messages come. Messages from the only person who claims to know you are here. The only person who can set you free.

The person who hates you the most.

A creepypasta vibe with sci-fi elements. There are five endings, and a full playthrough to one ending without using a text skip option should take 10-20 minutes. 

This IF game is fine to be played windowed or fullscreen, but the playable area will always be limited.
